title: Viral Amazon Orolay winter coat is back on sale and shoppers are still loving it
text:

The chilly season is upon us and many people are looking for the perfect winter coat to beat the cold.

Luckily, an unbelievably cosy jacket that went viral last year has gone back on sale at Amazon .

The Orolay Women's Thickened Down Jacket is made from 90% duck down material and 10% feathers, making it the ultimate warm layer for winter.

It became a viral hit last winter and was soon Amazon's number one bestseller in women’s down jackets and parkas.

On the Amazon US website, it has more than 7,000 customer reviews that include plenty of positive comments about its incredible warmth and sleek silhouette.

You can now buy the cosy Orolay jacket in six versatile colours including beige, black, grey and, our personal favourite, red.

But at £149.99, snapping one up for your winter wardrobe doesn't come cheap.

However, the windproof and warm-keeping quality certainly makes it worth splashing out on.

So snap one up soon because baby, it's cold outside.

If you're looking for more winter outerwear options, browse our roundup of the best winter coats for the chilly months ahead - including cuddly puffas and on-trend 70s style shearling options.
description: Beat the chill in Amazon's best-selling coat that went viral last year for its amazing warmth and quality
